mapper.insert: insert into book(bk_isbn, bk_title, bk_subtitle, bk_au_writer, bk_publish, bk_page, bk_publish_date, bk_mainImg, bk_mainUpload, bk_pu_num) values(#{bk_isbn}, #{bk_title}, #{bk_subtitle}, #{bk_au_writer}, #{bk_publish}, #{bk_page}, #{bk_publish_date}, #{bk_mainImg}, #{bk_mainUpload}, #{bk_pu_num})
